verse.name: v1
v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I’ve tasted and seen, of the sweetest of Loves Where my heart becomes free, and my shame is undone Your Presence, Lord Holy Spirit You are welcome here Come flood this place and fill the atmosphere Your Glory God is what our hearts long for To be overcome by Your Presence, Lord Your Presence, Lord{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Let us become more aware of Your Presence Let us experience the Glory of Your Goodness (2x) Your Presence, Lord{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Holy Spirit You are welcome here Come flood this place and fill the atmosphere Your Glory God is what our hearts long for To be overcome by Your Presence, Lord{/lang-eng}
